text: @dcexaminer @brianstelter @GenFlynn That’s rich, considering left wing media wouldn’t shut up about Russia for three years. But as soon it’s it’s proven they were full of shit, “Shhhhh. Don’t talk about Russia. Just talk about coronavirus.”
